solution_line_template: He made ${smoothie_price_per_cup}/cup * {smoothie_cups_sold} cups = $<<{smoothie_price_per_cup}*{smoothie_cups_sold}={money_from_smoothies}>>{money_from_smoothies} from the smoothies.
He also made ${cake_price_per_cake}/cake * {cakes_sold} cakes = $<<{cake_price_per_cake}*{cakes_sold}={money_from_cakes}>>{money_from_cakes} from the cakes.
